name: Ailil
aura: Increase Ally C. RATE in  by 25

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Steals all buffs from the target the first time this Champion hits them with this skill. This effect cannot be resisted. 

Each subsequent time this attack hits an enemy, no buffs will be stolen. Instead, the damage will be increased by 10% for each buff on the target.
skills.name: Gnarled Scythe
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore [Strengthen], [Stone Skin], [Increase DEF], and [Ally Protection] buffs.

If this attack kills an enemy, fully heals this Champion and places a [Stone Skin] buff on them for 1 turn.
skills.name: Pierce the Carapace
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Attacks all enemies. 

Before attacking, removes any [Increase DEF] buffs on each target and replaces them with a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Also removes any [Strengthen] buffs on each target and replaces them with a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns. 

Places a [Block Buffs] debuff for 1 turn on enemies not under [Increase DEF] or [Strengthen] buffs before attacking.

The buff removal and the debuff placement cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Chill Wind of Autumn
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1

skills.desc:
Increases this Champion’s HP by 2,000 and DEF by 100 for every 1,000 ATK they have. 

Fills this Champion’s Turn Meter by 10% whenever they receive a buff.
skills.name: Force of Nature [P]
